meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>endure</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to endure</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: Those who are able <vocabulary>to endure</vocabulary> are those who have had a lot of training. Who has had the most training of anyone? Ninjas. What group are they part of? The <reading>shino</reading>bi (しの).
